BasicSTDPSynapses class¶

class brawn.models.synapses.BasicSTDPSynapses(input_ng, output_ng, name='synapses')[source]¶

Bases: brian2.synapses.synapses.Synapses

Pre-connected synapses following basic STDP behavior, with randomized initial weight.

Parameters:
input_ng : brian2.NeuronGroup

Input NeuronGroup.

output_ng : brian2.NeuronGroup

Output NeuronGroup.

name : str, optional

Name of the synapse group.
Attributes:
equations : str

Equations defining the evolution of the synapses.

on_pre_eqs : str

Equations defining the behavior on presynaptic spikes.

on_post_eqs : str

Equations defining the behavior on postsynaptic spikes.

namespace : dict

Namespace of the variables defining the synapses.
